AutoRestart.Explain: When this feature is turned on, the system will continuously check and confirm that if memory usage reaches 90%, it will automatically restart to avoid freezing or stopping.

LogFile.Explain: Record memory usage logs to fix errors. Default location: core/database/memory.logs
